content.query:
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'abfss://bank-raw-data@kraftsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/loans.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
WITH (
    loan_id VARCHAR(10),
    customer_id VARCHAR(10),
    loan_amount DECIMAL(12,2),
    loan_purpose VARCHAR(20),
    loan_term_months INT,
    interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
    issue_date DATE,
    loan_status VARCHAR(20)
) AS result;
